pageTitle: World Internetworks, Inc. Review - Web Design in Cottonwood Heights, UT - BBB Business Review - BBB serving Utah
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {6824=HISTORY OF COMPANY: According to information provided by the company they began business November 15, 1995. The company first came to the attention of the BBB under the name of Wealth International, then changed their name to W I International. The company was also known as World Internet Marketplace. Recently the company changed their name to World Internet works. Steven K. Hansen is the principal officer of the firm. The company is under new management and the BBB has been notified that the company is attempting to take care of all complaints that were associated with W I International. Mr. Hansen has stated that they are trying to rebuild and are willing to address all complaints that occurred under the name of W I International. Customer may seek assistance from the company through the company website.}

Reason for Rating To be accredited by BBB, a business must apply for accreditation and BBB must determine that the business meets BBB accreditation standards, which include a commitment to make a good faith effort to resolve any consumer complaints. BBB Accredited Businesses must pay a fee for accreditation review/monitoring and for support of BBB services to the public. Businesses are under no obligation to seek BBB accreditation, and some businesses are not accredited because they have not sought BBB accreditation. This business is not BBB accredited. BBB Accreditation BBB Business Reviews may not be reproduced for sales or promotional purposes.
